Plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.
Title: Dangerous Liaisons
Writer: Christopher Hampton (play), Choderlos de Laclos (novel), Christopher Hampton (screenplay)
Actors: Glenn Close, John Malkovich, Michelle Pfeiffer, Swoosie Kurtz
tomatoConsensus: Stylish, seductive, and clever, Stephen Frears' adaptation is a wickedly entertaining exploration of sexual politics.
